reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Country Programme 200119 Prevention of chronic malnutrition among under two yeras old children in Karusi province
Country Programme 200119 Prevention of chronic malnutrition among under two yeras old children in Karusi province

description.narrative: Das Länderprogramm soll in der besonders von Ernährungsunsicherheit und Mangelernährung betroffenen Provinz Karusi dazu beitragen, dass besonders vulnerable Personen wie stillende Mütter und Kleinkinder bis zu 2 Jahren unterstützt werden. Welternährungsprogramm wird durch behavioral change communication (BCC) zur Aufklärung der Mütter beitragen und die Errichtung von kitchen gardens sowie angemessene Ernährungspraxen für Babys und Kleinkinder fördern.

The Country programmes should contribute in particularly from food insecurity and lack food affected province of Karusi to the fact that particularly vulnerable people are supported like breastfeeding mothers and toddlers up to 2 years. World Food Programme will contribute by behavioral change communication (BCC) to the clarification of the mothers and promote the establishment of kitchen gardens as well as adequate food practise for babies and toddlers.

World Food Programme will contribute by behavioral change communication (BCC) to the clarification of the mothers and promote the establishment of kitchen gardens as well as adequate food practise for babies and toddlers.
